structure.unit: TRAFFIC REGULATIONS -- VEHICLE EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE

law.catch_line: Escaping contents -- Shifting or spilling loads.

text.section: No vehicle shall be operated upon any highway unless it is so constructed as to prevent its contents from escaping.

No vehicle shall be operated upon any public highway for a distance of over one (1) mile whose load is susceptible to shifting or spillage unless said load is covered with a device suitable for prevention of spillage.

law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 203, sec. 14, effective July 15, 1982. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2739g-49.
